text:
@kylegriffin1 @williamlegate What were they expecting? Like I don't get Americans. Are you all really going to wait until you reach 1 million deaths or more? It's genocide and suicide at the same time--homicide since you're deliberately spreading it that could kill others.

#COVID19 #TrumpVirus

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
